column4: Does anyone know where the passwords for access points you've connected to in the past is saved in Ubuntu?...
like.. if you go edit connections> open up an AP-> Wireless security.. there's an option to show password(which works.) but is there a file that contains all of them together?
llutz answered you... they're in ~/.gnome2/keyrings/... and the file is encrypted and it won't be of any use to you...
